name: Shriekmaw
oracle_text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
When Shriekmaw enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature.
Evoke {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

name: Faceless Devourer
oracle_text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
When Faceless Devourer enters the battlefield, exile another target creature with shadow.
When Faceless Devourer leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

name: Reality Acid
oracle_text:
Enchant permanent
Vanishing 3 (This Aura enters the battlefield with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
When Reality Acid leaves the battlefield, enchanted permanent's controller sacrifices it.

name: Dream Stalker
oracle_text: When Dream Stalker enters the battlefield, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: What happens when it is the dream that wakes and the sleeper that fades into memory?

name: Crystal Shard
oracle_text: {3}, {T} or {U}, {T}: Return target creature to its owner's hand unless its controller pays {1}.
flavor_text: The vedalken know it is not of this world, so they know that this world is not the only one.

name: Crookclaw Transmuter
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying
When Crookclaw Transmuter enters the battlefield, switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.

name: Thoughtseize
oracle_text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life.
flavor_text: "Any dream is a robust harvest. Still, I prefer the timeworn dreams, heavy with import, that haunt the obsessive mind."

name: Tendrils of Corruption
oracle_text: Tendrils of Corruption deals X damage to target creature and you gain X life, where X is the number of Swamps you control.
flavor_text:
"Even swamps need sustenance. We will give it to them, and in turn, they will sustain us."
—Ezrith, druid of the Dark Hours

name: Damnation
oracle_text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

name: Nether Traitor
oracle_text:
Haste
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Whenever another creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {B}. If you do, return Nether Traitor from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Harvester of Souls
oracle_text:
Deathtouch
Whenever another nontoken creature dies, you may draw a card.
flavor_text:
"He is judge, jury, and executioner because he killed them all."
—Bishop Cawle of Elgaud

name: Dread Return
oracle_text:
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Flashback—Sacrifice three creatures. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor_text: Those who forget the horrors of the past are doomed to re-meet them.

name: Yawgmoth, Thran Physician
oracle_text:
Protection from Humans
Pay 1 life, Sacrifice another creature: Put a -1/-1 counter on up to one target creature and draw a card.
{B}{B}, Discard a card: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

name: Grave Scrabbler
oracle_text:
Madness {1}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
When Grave Scrabbler enters the battlefield, if its madness cost was paid, you may return target creature card from a graveyard to its owner's hand.

name: Stronghold Rats
oracle_text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Whenever Stronghold Rats deals combat damage to a player, each player discards a card.
flavor_text: In the stronghold's dungeons, the shadows hide in the vermin.

name: Smallpox
oracle_text: Each player loses 1 life, discards a card, sacrifices a creature, then sacrifices a land.
flavor_text:
"Great losses often bring only a numb shock. To truly plunge a victim into misery, you must overwhelm him with many small sufferings."
—Ratadrabik of Urborg

name: Pit Keeper
oracle_text: When Pit Keeper enters the battlefield, if you have four or more creature cards in your graveyard, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "The undead are not 'awakened.' They are evicted when there is no room left in the pit for more bodies."

name: Deathspore Thallid
oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Deathspore Thallid.
Remove three spore counters from Deathspore Thallid: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
Sacrifice a Saproling: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

name: Blightspeaker
oracle_text:
{T}: Target player loses 1 life.
{4}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: One croaked sermon spreads propaganda and plague.

name: Vampire Hexmage
oracle_text:
First strike
Sacrifice Vampire Hexmage: Remove all counters from target permanent.
flavor_text: When the blood hunt lost its thrill, she looked for less tangible means of domination.

name: Premature Burial
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature that entered the battlefield since your last turn ended.
flavor_text:
"This soil knows well the taste of the dead. Give it the hunger for a living meal, and it can become a deadly ally."
—Ezrith, druid of the Dark Hours

name: Big Game Hunter
oracle_text:
When Big Game Hunter enters the battlefield, destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. It can't be regenerated.
Madness {B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Sudden Spoiling
oracle_text:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Until end of turn, creatures target player controls lose all abilities and have base power and toughness 0/2.

name: Read the Bones
oracle_text: Scry 2, then draw two cards. You lose 2 life. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
flavor_text: The dead know lessons the living haven't learned.

name: Mindstab
oracle_text:
Target player discards three cards.
Suspend 4—{B} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {B} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

name: Kor Dirge
oracle_text: All damage that would be dealt this turn to target creature you control by a source of your choice is dealt to another target creature instead.
flavor_text: Rath's new evincar eliminated the brutish moggs and took a new slave race, one more reminiscent of her own feline grace.

name: Ancestral Vision
oracle_text:
Suspend 4—{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, pay {U} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)
Target player draws three cards.

name: Errant Ephemeron
oracle_text:
Flying
Suspend 4—{1}{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{U} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

name: Veiling Oddity
oracle_text:
Suspend 4—{1}{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{U} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)
When the last time counter is removed from Veiling Oddity while it's exiled, creatures can't be blocked this turn.

name: Timebender
oracle_text:
Morph {U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Timebender is turned face up, choose one —
• Remove two time counters from target permanent or suspended card.
• Put two time counters on target permanent with a time counter on it or suspended card.

name: Repeal
oracle_text:
Return target nonland permanent with converted mana cost X to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Your deed cannot be undone. You, however, can be."
—Agosto, Azorius imperator

name: Mystical Teachings
oracle_text:
Search your library for an instant card or a card with flash, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
Flashback {5}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Careful Consideration
oracle_text: Target player draws four cards, then discards three cards. If you cast this spell during your main phase, instead that player draws four cards, then discards two cards.
flavor_text:
"Sages who take the time to verify their sources are rewarded for their diligence."
—Jhoira, to Teferi

name: Stonehorn Dignitary
oracle_text: When Stonehorn Dignitary enters the battlefield, target opponent skips their next combat phase.
flavor_text: It did not escape the ambassador's notice that the sound of war drums could also marshal the city to attention.

name: Baral, Chief of Compliance
oracle_text:
Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever a spell or ability you control counters a spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
flavor_text: "The echo of silence is music to my ears."

name: Saltblast
oracle_text: Destroy target nonwhite permanent.
flavor_text: Dominaria erodes with each passing gust.

name: Temporal Isolation
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has shadow. (It can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Prevent all damage that would be dealt by enchanted creature.

name: Delay
oracle_text: Counter target spell. If the spell is countered this way, exile it with three time counters on it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. If it doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend. (At the beginning of its owner's upkeep, remove a time counter from that card. When the last is removed, the player plays it without paying its mana cost. If it's a creature, it has haste.)

name: Logic Knot
oracle_text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}.
flavor_text: "Such sloppy work. Let's unravel it and try again!"

name: Trinket Mage
oracle_text: When Trinket Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

name: Disdainful Stroke
oracle_text: Counter target spell with converted mana cost 4 or greater.
flavor_text: "You are beneath contempt. Your lineage will be forgotten."

name: Spell Burst
oracle_text:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Counter target spell with converted mana cost X.

name: Draining Whelk
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying
When Draining Whelk enters the battlefield, counter target spell. Put X +1/+1 counters on Draining Whelk, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.

name: Aeon Chronicler
oracle_text:
Aeon Chronicler's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.
Suspend X—{X}{3}{U}. X can't be 0. (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {X}{3}{U} and exile it with X time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)
Whenever a time counter is removed from Aeon Chronicler while it's exiled, draw a card.

name: Snapback
oracle_text:
You may exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"If it returns years hence, our knowledge of how to combat it will be that much greater."
—Andorel, Tolarian sentinel

name: Pongify
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Ape creature token.
flavor_text: Some spellcrafting mistakes go on to become spells of their own.

name: Foresee
oracle_text: Scry 4, then draw two cards. (To scry 4, look at the top four cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
flavor_text: Wind time's watch, and watch time unwind.

name: Bonded Fetch
oracle_text:
Defender, haste
{T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor_text: A well-made homunculus grooms the mind of its master, pruning the thoughts that lead to madness. Few loredelvers survive the study of the infinite without one.

name: Treasure Cruise
oracle_text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Draw three cards.
flavor_text: Countless delights drift on the surface while dark schemes run below.

name: Think Twice
oracle_text:
Draw a card.
Flashback {2}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor_text:
"Great books are meant to be read, then read again backwards or upside down!"
—Ettovard, Tolarian archivist
